wikitext.*:
'''OKO''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "wicked, evil".<ref name=Eldarin>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 149 (root appearing as "OKO")</ref>

The root is one of the opposites of [[AYA]].<ref name=Eldarin/>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''olca''<ref name=Eldarin/>
*[[Sindarin]]: ''ogol''
